key.name: lyrics-sources
key.summary: List of lyrics sources to be scanned
key.description: Lyrics sources are scanned in the order they are given in this list, you can rearrange them or delete particular sources completely. Separate values by comma. Possbile values are: 'Lyricwiki.org', 'Letras.terra.com.br', 'Metrolyrics.com', 'Chartlyrics.com', 'Lyrdb.com', 'Sogou.com'

key.name: cache-lyrics
key.summary: Whether lyrics are saved or not
key.description: If set to True, lyrics are stored under "~/.cache/rhythmbox/lyrics/". Set to False to disable this (note that in this case, lyrics sources have to be rescanned everytime).
